snippet: Raúl Salinas de Gortari has been cleared of charges of illicit enrichment, ending his two decades of legal battles over charges ranging from money laundering to murder.
abstract: Raul Salinas de Gortari is cleared of charges of illicit enrichment, ending his two decades of legal battles in Mexico over charges ranging from money laundering to murder; Salinas de Gortari is brother of former Pres Carlos Salinas de Gortari.
lead_paragraph: Raúl Salinas de Gortari has been cleared of charges of illicit enrichment, ending his two decades of legal battles over charges ranging from money laundering to murder.

headline.main: Mexico: Former President’s Brother Is Cleared in a Corruption Case
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Former President’s Brother Is Cleared in a Corruption Case
